title: Wide support seen for nationwide smoking ban (The Central People's Government of the People's Republic ...
text: ( Source : The Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China ) Even some smokers in China support a nationwide smoke-free law, particularly in workplaces, according to a report released on Oct 19 by the World Health
